resources.string: Fast play song that recently added in any music library
In this Activity hear your Song or pay for downloaded
1.Add Android Mobile Payment Library SDK in lib folder. API downloded from PayPal Site
2.Add permission in AndroidManifest file and Declare the API
3.Design UI in Payment Activity to gather data from user
4.Configure the PayPal Object and integrate the data from user with paypal using the function in paypal lib
5.Create the payment after user press button and lunch the payment Intent to send the request to paypal server if its proof the payment complet
In this Activity classify all Library in Musical app we indicate here to 2 Libraries (Artist and Album)only as example
In this Activity show an album library content
In this Activity show an artist library content
